name: vk-legacy-notice
description: You can make and register your original custom block patterns.

scripts.update: ncu -u -x '@wordpress/env' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.dist: composer install --no-dev && gulp dist && composer install
scripts.phpunit: composer install && wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/vk-legacy-notice/.phpunit.xml --testsuite default --verbose'

author: Vektor,Inc.
